column5: Going to be in the Area tommorow and may have to take the afternoon off :-)  Are those waters clear or muddy with this bit of rain?
Go take a look and let us know!

Went 1 for 3 with 3 inches visibility, and more rain came just as I left, fishing was slow on the trib I was on, with my fish coming from pocket water, and runs, ganny was even dirtier, and almost totalled when I left their, with floating grass and branches starting to come down the river. Should have went west but thats another day

Muddy, high, expired chocolate milk looking including clumps.  Not worth it at all.  But hey, up to you to take my word for it.  Kidding around, but all the rivers/creeks clear out different.  You HAVE to have a look for yourself.  My fishable water may be different then yours.
Check out Duffins this morning.  It is MUDDY!  Chocolate milk.  Almost 0 visibility.
All rivers were high and muddy last weekend, there was one fishable...steel-a-plenty  I'm sure this week-end may be better
